newsitem.title: POLAND: Warta must pay PLN 100 mln for floods.
newsitem.headline: Warta must pay PLN 100 mln for floods.

text.p: Polish insurer Warta estimates that it will receive 100 million zlotys worth of non-reinsured claims due to the current flooding, the company said in a statement on Wednesday.
Warta however said that the flood claims would not affect its financial stability or earnings data for 1997.

"A correct investment policy, proper re-insurance coverage, forming financial reserves at an according level and the fulfilling of all legal financial security critera of an insurer results in no threat to the clients or stockholders of the firm," the statement said.
